  • Method Details

    • formatDecimal

      public static java.lang.String formatDecimal​(int unformattedValue, int decimalPlaces, boolean isRounded)
      Takes an unformatted value, and formats it to the given decimal places with rounding or truncation using BigDecimal.
      Parameters:
      unformattedValue - Int the value to format
      decimalPlaces - Integer the number of decimal places to round/truncate/pad to
      isRounded - Boolean whether we are rounding (true) or truncating (false)
      Returns:
      String a formatted string of the decimal with the given decimal places and rounding/truncation

    • formatDecimal

      public static java.lang.String formatDecimal​(double unformattedValue, int decimalPlaces, boolean isRounded)
      Takes an unformatted value, and formats it to the given decimal places with rounding or truncation using BigDecimal.
      Parameters:
      unformattedValue - Double the value to format
      decimalPlaces - Integer the number of decimal places to round/truncate/pad to
      isRounded - Boolean whether we are rounding (true) or truncating (false)
      Returns:
      String a formatted string of the decimal with the given decimal places and rounding/truncation

    • formatDecimal

      public static java.lang.String formatDecimal​(java.math.BigDecimal unformattedValue, int decimalPlaces, boolean isRounded)
      Takes an unformatted value, and formats it to the given decimal places with rounding or truncation.
      Parameters:
      unformattedValue - BigDecimal the unformatted decimal to format
      decimalPlaces - Integer the number of decimal places to round/truncate/pad to
      isRounded - Boolean whether we are rounding (true) or truncating (false)
      Returns:
      String a formatted string of the decimal with the given decimal places and rounding/truncation
